entry.title: Violet Crumble Collagen Dream Advanced Sleep Formula Hot Chocolate - 231g
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Collagen Co.
Type:
Price: 49.00

 

Description

Imagine a velvety cocoa base infused with the sweet essence of honeycomb. It's like sipping on a cozy, nostalgic hug from your favorite childhood treat. It's more than your typical hot chocolate; it's a decadent nightcap where flavour meets wellness, promising a rejuvenating bedtime experience like no other. *Scoop included.

Benefits

Indulge in our collagen-infused hot chocolate sleep formula for a delicious and beneficial treat. The collagen supports skin health, reducing fine lines and promoting elasticity. It also helps with joint health and muscle relaxation, providing a calming effect for a better sleep experience. Wake up feeling refreshed, revitalized, and with a radiant glow.

  • 5g collagen per serve (5,000mg)
  • Magnesium to regulate melatonin production and promote relaxation
  • Chamomile to reduce anxiety and improve sleep quality
  • Zinc to regulate sleep patterns and melatonin synthesis
  • A delicious Hot Chocolate naturally sweetened

Ingredients

  • 100% Hydrolyzed Collagen Peptides (Bovine)

This bioavailable form of collagen is highly digestible with enhanced absorption, allowing it to effectively support healthy skin, hair, nails, joints and overall health and wellness. For results you can truly see and feel.

  • Magnesium

Regulates neurotransmitters and melatonin production, promoting relaxation and improving sleep quality.

  • Zinc

Regulates sleep patterns and melatonin synthesis, contributing to better sleep quality and a healthy sleep-wake cycle. 

  • Chamomile

Exerts mild sedative effects, reduces anxiety and improves sleep quality.

  • L-tryptophan

Promotes relaxation and restful sleep by aiding in the production of serotonin and melatonin.

  • L-theanine

Enhances sleep quality by inducing relaxation and reducing anxiety through increased alpha brain wave activity.

  • Passionflower

Reduces anxiety, improves sleep quality, and promotes relaxation by increasing GABA levels. 

  • Valerian Root

Acts as a natural sleep aid, promoting relaxation and supporting better sleep.

  • Natural Cocoa Powder, Natural Flavours, Erythritol, Australian Sea Salt, Natural Sweetener (Thaumatin).

How to Use

  1. Add 1 serving (2 scoops)  into your mug.
  2. Pour 200-250ml hot  water into the mug.
  3. Mix well until the powder is totally dissolved.
  4. Add a splash of milk or milk alternative for extra creaminess.

Nutrition Information

Common FAQs

Is Collagen Dream Dairy Free?

Absolutely, our Collagen Dream Advanced Sleep Formula is completely free of dairy. Indulge in our luscious hot chocolate by blending it with hot water or your preferred milk substitute for an added touch of creaminess.

Can I have Collagen Dream as well as Premium Collagen Peptides?

Certainly, it's absolutely fine to consume both products within the same day. In fact, they're designed to compliment each other as each product offers their own benefits: the Premium Collagen Peptides contain ingredients that promote beauty, ligament and joint health. It's a great choice for a refreshing morning boost or an afternoon indulgence. On the other hand, with ingredients support sleep and relaxation, Collagen Dream is ideally taken before bedtime or to relish a guilt-free sweet treat after dinner.

When should I take Collagen Dream?

For optimal results, we suggest consuming Collagen Dream approximately 30 minutes before your intended sleep time. This allows the calming ingredients to initiate their soothing effects and help you unwind effectively.

How to Use

  2. Pour 200-250ml hot water into the mug.
  3. Mix well until the powder is totally dissolved.

Nutrition Information

Mulberry Silk Benefits

Anti-aging Properties
The 100% Mulberry Silk sleep mask's anti-ageing properties gently caress your skin, promoting a smoother, more youthful complexion during your restful slumber.

Naturally Hydrating
Drift into a naturally hydrating sleep experience with this Mulberry Silk mask, as it helps retain skin moisture, leaving you refreshed and glowing upon waking.

Hypoallergenic
This hypoallergenic Mulberry Silk sleep mask ensures a soothing and irritation-free sleep, perfect for sensitive skin and allergy sufferers.

Antimicrobial
Embrace a clean and germ-free sleep environment with the antimicrobial properties of the Mulberry Silk sleep mask, safeguarding you from unwanted.

Silk Care Instructions

Cold hand wash with gentle liquid detergent. Air dry after washing. Do not tumble dry, iron or wash with chlorine bleach.

entry.title: Mulberry Silk Sleep Mask
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Collagen Co.
Type:
Price: 45.00

Description

Drift away on a cloud of pure bliss with our Mulberry Silk Sleep Mask. With every gentle touch against your skin, feel the cares of the day dissolve, replaced by a sense of calm as the luxurious silk delicately shields your eyes, inviting you to embrace a night of deep, restorative slumber.

  • Lightweight design for maximum comfort.
  • Ultra-soft materials for a gentle and luxurious feel.
  • Enhanced sleep quality by blocking out light effectively.
  • Provides a deep, undisturbed sleep experience.

Mulberry Silk Benefits
